description: System-generated unique identifier for the engine record in this table; used to join and reference engine attributes.
Date and time associated with this engine record, likely denoting creation or last update (UTC); confirm exact semantics with SME.
Engine displacement capacity, including unit of measure (e.g., liters or cubic inches). Values may include descriptive text or model references; normalize units for analytics.
Identifier from a legacy system corresponding to this engine record; used for data migration, lineage, or cross-system mapping.
Name of the source legacy table from which this engine record originated; supports lineage and traceability.
